item.title: Extreme Ownership: How U.S. Navy SEALs Lead and Win - Jocko Willink
item.description: Extreme Ownership: How U.S. Navy SEALs Lead and Win Jocko Willink Notes and Thoughts when it comes to performance standards: “It’s not what you preach, it’s what you tolerate…” “There are no bad teams.

item.title: How to Save the Planet Earth on a Personal Level
item.description: How to Save the Planet Earth on a Personal Level protect and expand wildlife eat vegan carbon-free/carbon-decreasing technologies responsible travel reduce waste

item.title: How to Use Obsidian
item.description: Obsidian Knowledge base software based on linkable plain text md (=markdown) files. My personal usage guidelines write everything in english Used plugins Markdown and Obsidian syntax Markdown syntax cheat-sheet . Official one https://help.

item.title: How to Write Book Summary
item.description: The Goal The goal of my personal book summary is to connect and embed the thoughts presented in the book into my personal active knowledge. Insert it into my internal structuralization. And if possible, create for myself actionable steps.

item.title: Man's Search For Meaning - Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: Man’s Search For Meaning Viktor E. Frankl Written by Viktor Emil Frankl (1905-1997), who was a Viennees neurologist, psychiatrist and founder and propagator of Logotherapy. Logotherapy is a school of psychology, with focus on the future and discovering man’s life purpose, which Frankl claims is essencial and a pure need of a man and needs to be fullfilled.
